#summary Checkout and build procedure

_Note: this is a work in progress._

= Checkout =

See the source tab for instructions on how to check out Soar. Note that most users will only need the `SoarSuite` sub-folder of trunk.

= Prerequisites =

== Java ==
Most users will want to use Java, as most of the Soar tools and environments are written in Java.
  * Download and install the latest Java SE 6 JDK from http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
